summary: A fun banana-themed social platform built with React + Motoko. Users can post banana-related content, react with banana emojis, follow other users, and browse a feed of banana posts.
architectural_notes: Built with React (frontend) and Motoko (backend/smart contracts on ICP)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cartoon banana bunch logo with a cheerful face on a transparent background (banana-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Warm yellow textured banner background with scattered hand-drawn banana illustrations (feed-banner.dim_1200x300.png)

existing_features.title: Build a global feed page that fetches and displays all posts in reverse-chronological order. Each post card must show the author's username, avatar emoji, post content, timestamp, and a banana reaction button (üçå) displaying the current reaction count. Clicking the reaction button calls reactToPost on the backend.
Build a Compose Post UI ‚Äî a text area (max 280 characters) with a üçå submit button ‚Äî that calls createPost on the backend and prepends the new post to the feed on success.

Build a User Profile page that displays the user's username, avatar emoji, follower count, following count, and their posts. Include Follow / Unfollow toggle button that calls followUser or unfollowUser on the backend and updates the counts in the UI.

Apply a bold, playful visual theme inspired by bananas: a warm yellow and deep brown color palette, rounded card components, banana-emoji accents throughout the UI, cheerful sans-serif typography, and a sticky top navigation bar with the app logo and links to Feed and Profile. Keep the layout mobile-friendly and enforce the theme consistently across all pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: React to posts with banana emojis
Browse a feed of banana posts

Implement a backend data model and actor with the following entities: User (id, username, avatarEmoji, followersCount, followingCount), Post (id, authorId, content, bananaReactions, timestamp), and Follow (followerId, followeeId). Expose query and update methods: createUser, getUser, createPost, getPosts (paginated feed), reactToPost (increment banana reaction count), followUser, unfollowUser, getFollowers, getFollowing.
